PLATINUM - Enum constant in enum class enums.CinemaClassType
 
popTillView(Class<?>) - Static method in class operator.ViewOperator
This method will continuously pop View objects from the views stack until it founds a BaseView object at the top of the stack that is of the specified class type.
popToBaseView() - Static method in class operator.ViewOperator
This method will keep popping View object from the views stack until the views stack only contains one BaseView object.
popView() - Static method in class operator.ViewOperator
This method helps to pop the current View object that is on top of the stack Upon doing so, the next View object that is now at the top of the views stack will be activated to show its content.
popViews(int) - Static method in class operator.ViewOperator
This method helps to pop multiple View objects in the views stack at once.

This class is responsible for calculating the ticket prices based on the various factors.

printDouble(double, int) - Static method in class operator.FileInputOutputOperator
This method helps to print double value with a specified number of decimal place.

This method helps to print String content in any BaseView.
printMenuOptions(ArrayList<String>) - Static method in class operator.FileInputOutputOperator
This method helps to print the numbered options in a consistent format.
printMenuTitle(String) - Static method in class operator.FileInputOutputOperator
This method prints the title of each menu view in a pretty format
printMultipageOptions(ArrayList<E>, int, String) - Static method in class operator.FileInputOutputOperator
Given an ArrayList of any type, this method helps to transform the list into multi-page options menu and manage the navigation of the pages.
printMultipageOptionsWithReturnedChoice(ArrayList<E>, int) - Static method in class operator.FileInputOutputOperator
Given an ArrayList of any type, this method helps to transform the list into multi-page options menu and manage the navigation of the pages and selection of the element in the multi-page menu options.

Prints the seat layout for moviegoers to visualise.

This method helps to push new BaseView onto the existing BaseView stack.
